branchCategory.name: 90-RS(1)H, Stopper Cylinder, Heavy Duty
branchCategory.description: <p>Stopper Cylinder series 90-RSH and 90-RS1H series is a heavy-duty stopper cylinder is  specially designed for use on conveyor lines or other applications requiring an external stopping device.  90-RS(1)H is made from materials compatible with secondary battery manufacturing.</p>
branchCategory.bullets: <UL> <LI>Heavy duty stopper cylinder <LI>Compatible with secondary batteries <LI>Double acting &amp; single acting available <LI>Bore sizes: 20mm, 32mm <LI>Stroke range: 15mm to 20mm <LI>Auto switch capable </LI></UL>
